metadata.dc:author: Castejón Castán, L M
Grandas Alonso, I
Carda Aparici, P
García-Blanco Saceda, P
metadata.dc:description: The authors describe the results of the hospital registry of tumors made at the National Institute of Oncology in Madrid, following the rules given by the cancer specialists of the World Health Organization. The studied cases correspond to the cancer patients that were seen during the year 1977 for the first time.
metadata.dc:title: Registro hospitalario de cáncer. Estudio de los casos registrados en 1977.
[The hospital cancer registry. A study of the cases registered in 1977].
